subtitle: This creamy potato topped bake is an ideal mid-week family meal.

method.text: Place the potato slices in a pan. Cover with salted water. Bring to the boil. Reduce the heat. Cook for 10 min, until tender.
Grill bacon for 6-8 min, until crisp. Cut into pieces.

Melt half of the butter in a pan. Stir in the flour. Cook for 1 min. Gradually add the milk, stirring continuously. Cook until the sauce thickens. Stir in the cheese. Stir in the remaining ingredients.
Spoon mixture into a shallow 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> ltr dish. Arrange the potato slices on top. Dot with remaining butter.
Place under the grill for 2-3 min, until golden. Serve immediately.
